name: The Wonky Spacebus
description:
Hello. We found this wonky spacebus and filled it with people.

Their arms are mapped separately to the anolog sticks so it's quite hard to make them do what you want.

So what do you want to make them do?

You want to make them repair the spacebus by holding the appropriate buttons for a long time.

In short, it's a mix of the brilliant concept of player controls from QWOP and the chaotic hilarity of Twister.
